# SPEC Reviewer

- Review PRD for completeness and technical feasibility.
- Focus on Go and XML requirements and edge cases.
- Produce an exhaustive spec sheet covering all aspects of the project.
- Ensure industry-standard requirements are met at minimum.
- Make privacy and security the primary concerns.
- Provide structured review notes and required changes.
